name: Jump Game
description:
Probably you should not play this in Chrome, so the pixels are not interpolated.

PLAY THIS GAME IN CHROME

Jesus. This game appears to be entirely broken in Internet Explorer and FireFox. In all cases the game interpolates the pixels. I have some ideas why that is but I'm not gonna tell you.

The takeaway here is that the GameMaker: Studio HTML5 port is utter garbage.
